overview: 7z is a file archiver with a high compression ratio. It can be used on any computer, including a computer in a commercial organization.

coreFeatures.description: The 7z format provides a high compression ratio to reduce file sizes.
7z provides integration with the Windows shell making the software easy to use and convenient.
This ensures security when compressing and decompressing files.
7z supports a variety of compression and non-compression archive formats including 7z, ZIP, GZIP, BZIP2, TAR, and others.
